pf.graph
Interface Direction

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectionImpl
public interface Direction

Represents a particular direction of an Edge.

To have totally independent packages pf.graph and pf.analytics, this interface doesn't use advantages of Vectors, it has its own implementation.

Author:
Adam Juraszek

Method Summary
 int getDx()
          Gets difference of x coordinate part.
 int getDy()
          Gets difference of y coordinate part.
 Direction getOpposite()
          Gets the opposite direction to this.
 boolean isPrimary()
          Only one of Directions: this, opposite is primary.

Returns:

isPrimary

boolean isPrimary()
Only one of Directions: this, opposite is primary. This is useful in iterating over edges which shall return each edge only once.

Returns:
true if this direction is primary, false otherwise
See Also:
getOpposite()
